meanings.definition: Not producing or achieving desired results.
meanings.sent1: The rainy weather made our outdoor plans unproductive.
meanings.sent2: The unproductive meeting wasted everyone's time.
meanings.sent3: Trying to study with loud music playing was quite unproductive.
meanings.sent4: Her unproductive efforts were like trying to fill a leaky bucket.
meanings.sent5: The unproductive soil refused to yield any crops.

meanings.sent1: The old computer was unproductive and slow.
meanings.sent2: The unproductive factory struggled to meet its quotas.
meanings.sent3: His unproductive attempts at cooking always ended in burnt food.
meanings.sent4: The unproductive engine sputtered and failed to start.
meanings.sent5: The unproductive assembly line caused delays in production.
